main event: Multiple unidentified flying object sightings were reported near Kirtland Air Force Base in New Mexico in 1959, involving bright, erratic luminous objects that changed course and disappeared at incredible speeds.
interesting points: The objects were described as very bright, erratic, and exhibiting unusual movements.
Pilots from the 4950th Test Group reported seeing a UFO that was estimated to be between 40 and 50 feet in diameter, oscillating or wobbling as it moved.
The UFOs were observed for approximately 10 to 15 minutes before suddenly accelerating at a terrific rate of speed and disappearing from view.
The observed objects were definitely not identified as meteors or weather balloons, presenting a mystery to the observers.
The report requested further evaluation and possible investigation by appropriate agencies due to the nature of the sightings.
location: Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico
